model.undo

Class AddItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.undo.AddItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command

    public class AddItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command
    Encapsulates the reversible action of adding a new Item (and perhaps a new Product) to the system.
    Author:
    clayton

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AddItem(java.lang.String productBarcode, java.util.Date entryDate, int count, model.ProductManager productManager, model.ItemManager itemManager)
      Constructs an AddItem command with the given dependencies.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute()
      Add an Item to the model based on the data provided on construction.
      model.Item getAddedItem()
      Returns the Item added by the execute method of this Command.
      void undo()
      Remove an Item previously added by the execute method.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AddItem

        public AddItem(java.lang.String productBarcode,
       java.util.Date entryDate,
       int count,
       model.ProductManager productManager,
       model.ItemManager itemManager)
        Constructs an AddItem command with the given dependencies.
        Parameters:
        productBarcode - Barcode of the to-be-created Item's Product
        entryDate - Entry date of the to-be-created Item
        count - Number of Items to be created
        productManager - Manager to notify if a new Product is created
        itemManager - Manager to notify of the new Item
        Pre-Conditions:
        productBarcode != null, entryDate != null, count > 0, productManager != null, itemManager != null
        Post-Conditions:
        getAddedItem() == null
